org.apache.flink.graph.library.linkanalysis

类 HITS.Sum

    private static class HITS.Sum
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReduceFunction<DoubleValue>
    Sum over values. This specialized function is used in place of generic aggregation.

    • 方法详细资料

      • reduce

        public DoubleValue reduce(DoubleValue first,
                          DoubleValue second)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: ReduceFunction
        The core method of ReduceFunction, combining two values into one value of the same type. The reduce function is consecutively applied to all values of a group until only a single value remains.
        指定者:
        reduce 在接口中 ReduceFunction<DoubleValue>
        参数:
        first - The first value to combine.
        second - The second value to combine.
        返回:
        The combined value of both input values.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - This method may throw exceptions. Throwing an exception will cause the operation to fail and may trigger recovery.
